title: dyn * ICE when used in constant and static

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(dyn_star)] const _: dyn* Send = &(); // static V: dyn* Send = Sync = &(); fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` 1.68.0 nightly ``` ### Error output ``` thread '' panicked at 'not implemented', compiler/rustc_const_eval/src/transform/check_consts/check.rs:559:17 ```
Backtrace

``` thread '' panicked at 'not implemented', compiler/rustc_const_eval/src/transform/check_consts/check.rs:559:17 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f10b0a657da - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::hc0c2c1a0c2b552f0 at /rustc/ec56537c4325ce5b798fc3628cbdd48ba4949ae5/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f10b0a657da -
